//longest desc Login to your existing account to access all the features in Zwallet. Create your account to access Zwallet. Enter your Zwallet e-mail so we can send you a password reset link. We got your personal information from the sign up proccess. If you want to make changes on your information, contact our support. arrow back icon Personal Information Change Password Repeat Password New Password Current Password You must enter your current password and then type your new password twice. Back Button Create Security PIN Create a PIN that’s contain 6 digits number for security purpose in Zwallet. Confirm PIN Successfully Created Your PIN was successfully created and you can now access all the features in Zwallet. Login to your new account and start exploring! Login Now Find Receiver Confirmation Details success check icon Transfer to Transfer Failed We can’t transfer your money at the moment, we recommend you to check your internet connection and try again. Success Icon Transfer Success Notification Icon Balance Transaction History See all Login 0.00 Add at least one phone number for the transfer ID so you can start transfering your money to another user.
